PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-14232010-11-18,  ,  ,  TC,  TB, 
ActNational Capital Act
SubjectNational Capital Commission / Nortel Networks Limited** LEASING ** Carling Avenue Facility **AMENDMENT**
PrecisOrder authorizing the NATIONAL CAPITAL COMMISSION to consent to the assignment of an existing LEASE with Nortel Networks Limited for the property known as the CARLING AVENUE FACILITY in Ottawa, Ontario, and to amend the lease for the purposes of a consolidated headquarters for the Department of National Defence.
AttachmentsAttachment
